title: If you have great doubt in your mind
content: Jai Sri Ram Although Lord Shiva repeated this time after time, His exhortation made no impression on the heart of Sati, Then the great Lord Shiva smilingly said_ Realizing in his heart the potency of Sri Hari's Maya-----If you have great doubt in your mind, why not go and verify the thing, May Lord Bless all, Thanks Please
contentWithMarkup:
Jai Sri Ram
Although Lord Shiva repeated this time after time,

His exhortation made no impression on the heart of Sati,

Then the great Lord Shiva smilingly said_

Realizing in his heart the potency of Sri Hari's Maya-----If you have great doubt in your mind, why not go and verify the thing,

May Lord Bless all,

Thanks Please

feed.name: GLORY OF LORD RAMA
feed.description:
GLORY OF LORD RAMA by mcsharma  राम रामेति रामेति रमे रामे मनोरमे - सहस्त्र नाम तुतुल्यम राम नाम वरानने - राम राम शुब रटी सब खान आनंद धाम - सहस्त्र नाम के तुल्य है राम नाम शुभ नाम___
मंगल भवन अमंगल हारी उमा सहित जेहि जपहि पुरारी
